alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; La Salle; Lee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 3:55PM CDT until March 31 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern La Salle County in north central Illinois... Southeastern Lee County in north central Illinois... Southern De Kalb County in north central Illinois... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 354 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over DePue, or near Hennepin, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Ottawa, Peru, La Salle, Sandwich, Mendota, Sheridan, Lake Holiday, Oglesby, Somonauk, Earlville, North Utica, Serena, Leland, Paw Paw, Millington, Dayton, Cedar Point, Troy Grove, Triumph and Harding. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 53 and 79. I-80 between mile markers 74 and 92. This includes... Sandwich Fairgrounds, Illinois Valley Community College, Matthiessen State Park, and Tri-County Fairgrounds. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Illinois.
